import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardFooter, CardHeader, Col, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, Row, Table } from 'reactstrap'; class User extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.onRadioBtnClick = this.onRadioBtnClick.bind(this); this.state = { cod:'', fullname: '', email:'', cpf:'', bithdate:'', sex: '', radioSelected: 2, }; } clearFields = () => { this.setState({ fullname: '', email:'', cpf:'', birthdate:'', sex: '' }); } handleChange = event => { this.setState({ [event.target.id]: event.target.value }); } onRadioBtnClick(radioSelected) { this.setState({ sex: radioSelected.target.value, }); } render() { console.log(this.props.match.params.id). //const user = usersData.find( user => user.id.toString() === this.props.match.params.id) //const userDetails = user ? Object.entries(user) : [['id', ( Not found)]] return (
Alterar Usuário
 
) } } export default User;
